Abhinav_Shukla_Resume_Blue.pdf (1).pdf.job_desc:
Job Title: AI/ML Intern (Remote)

Location: Remote
Duration: 3 Months
Type: Internship (Part-time / Full-time)

About the Role:

We are looking for a motivated AI/ML Intern who is eager to learn and explore the exciting world of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. This internship is ideal for beginners with basic programming knowledge and a keen interest in AI/ML concepts. You will work under the guidance of experienced mentors on real-world projects and gain hands-on exposure to tools and workflows used in the industry.

Key Responsibilities:

Assist in data collection, cleaning, and preprocessing.

Support in building and testing simple ML models.

Help document project workflows, experiments, and results.

Research AI/ML concepts and summarize findings for the team.

Collaborate with the team on small coding or automation tasks.

Requirements:

Basic understanding of programming (Python preferred).

Familiarity with AI/ML concepts (optional but a plus).

Strong willingness to learn and explore new technologies.

Good communication and problem-solving skills.

Reliable internet connection (remote role).

What You’ll Gain:

Hands-on exposure to real-world AI/ML projects.

Mentorship and guidance from experienced professionals.

A chance to build your portfolio and strengthen your resume.

Certificate of completion and possible future opportunities.
Abhinav_Shukla_Resume_Blue.pdf (1).pdf.text: ABHINAV SHUKLA Delhi • +91-7289-874-139 • abhinav.shukla@outlook.in • LinkedIn: Abhinav Shukla (linkedin.com/in/abhinav-shukla-837141300) B.Tech student specializing in AI/ML with hands-on experience building applications, models, and web tools. Skilled in Python, Java, and C++ with knowledge of machine learning, deep learning, NLP, and prompt engineering. Applied AI in edtech, media, and content automation. Aribumar_resume.pdf.text: ARIB UMAR Email : aribumar2328@gmail.com | Tel. : +91-7366069443 Profile Summary Trained Software Tester with 1.3 years of experience in manual and automation testing. Proficient in Selenium WebDriver, TestNG, and Java, with strong skills in test case design, defect tracking (JIRA), and Agile methodologies. Passionate about ensuring software quality through efficient testing and automation. Experience Gamp.Ai, USA(Remote) Full-time 03/2024 – 06/2025 [Selenium, Java, TestNG, JIRA, Manual & Automation Testing] (1.3Years) ● Performed manual and automation testing of the NUIQ platform. ● Developed automated test scripts using Selenium WebDriver & TestNG. ● Executed regression, smoke, and UI tests; logged defects using JIRA. ● Collaborated with Agile teams to improve QA processes and test coverage. Education Diploma in CSE June 2023-June2026 Ambedkar Institute of Technology, DSEU CGPA - 8 BPS Public School March 2023 CBSE Board Percentage - 63 Technical Skills ● Programming Languages: Java, Python, C, HTML ● Automation & Testing Tools: Selenium WebDriver, TestNG, JIRA, Manual Testing ● Frameworks & Methodologies: TestNG Framework, Data-Driven Testing, Agile/Scrum, Regression Testing, Smoke Testing, UI Validation ● Build & CI/CD Tools: Maven,Git/GitHub ● Bug Tracking & QA Tools: JIRA, QA/QC Practices, Test Planning & Reporting ● Other Tools: MS Excel, MS Word ● Core Competencies: Test Case Design, Functional Testing, Regression Testing, Cross-Browser Testing, Quality Assurance Projects & Training __________________________________________________________ Automated E-commerce Checkout Testing (Jun 2024 – Jun 2025) ● Developed an automated test scenario to validate the checkout process of an e-commerce website using Selenium & Java . ● Validated login functionality with email/password authentication and automated multi-product cart addition. ● Verified cart value accuracy ($3,000) and automated the checkout workflow. ● Technologies Used: Selenium, Java, JIRA ● Outcome: Successfully automated checkout, ensuring cart accuracy and smooth user experience. Software Testing Training – Internshala (Mar 2024) ● Learned Java Basics, Automation Testing, Selenium WebDriver Commands, Locators & Methods . ● Built hands-on skills in functional and UI testing . ● Achieved 80% score in final assessment. TestNG Framework (Udemy) (Feb – Mar 2024) ● Implemented TestNG framework for Selenium automation testing. ● Designed data-driven, parallel, and cross-browser testing strategies. ● Integrated TestNG with Maven & Jenkins for CI/CD pipelines. City: New Delhi Date:
